title: A critical error has occurred and the process must be terminated

replies.body: Try out the solutions in the [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Support article. Let me know if these steps do or don't work, and we can work out how to proceed from there!
The bug splat and game crashes didn't solve it.

Can you go into your League of Legends folder and provide the latest logs associated with your client crashing?

The default directory on Windows is:
> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\GameLogs

You can copy and paste the contents of the log in https://pastebin.com/ and share the results here.

If you havenâ€™t done so already, please give the Hextech Repair Tool a shot:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
I tried it and it still doesn't work, guess I'll have to play fullscreen :(
